Comment.Language: On Wednesday for the Fast of Jonah (in the Great Fast weekday tune):

Text.Language: Je a~mwini haroi: n/etc~marwout n~te Paiwt: a~rik~l/ronomin m~piwnq: eym/n e~bol sa e~neh.
Come to Me, you who are blessed of My Father, inherit the life, which endures forever.
تعالوا إلي يا مباركي أبي رثوا الحياة الدائمة إلي الأبد.

Comment.Language: On Wednesday for the Fast of Jonah (in the Great Fast weekday tune):

Text.Language: Pisasf n~wik afc~mou e~rwou: 4 n~so n~rwmi aft~ciwou: sasf m~bir aumoh m~mwou: qen nilakh: e~tauerhouo~ e~rwou.
He blessed the seven loaves of bread / He filled four thousand men. / Seven baskets were filled / with leftovers.
السبع خبزات باركها واشبع أربعة آلاف رجل وسبع قفف ملأها مما فضل عنهم.
